long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool for researchers out there. Arxiv is a huge repository of pre print research papers on a wide range of topics. However constantly checking on arxiv for the recent publications on the research topic you are working on can be tedious. Hence this extension allows users to watch for specific keywords and the extension will notify whenever a new publication has been added relevant to the added keyword.
